headline: The Why of technology
description: I think one of the things that really separates us from the high primates is that we&rsquo;re tool builders. I read a study that measured the efficiency of locomotion for various species on the planet. The condor used the least energy to move a kilometer. Humans came in with a rather unimpressive showing about a third of the way down the list. It was not too proud a showing for the crown of creation.
